title: Family-Friendly Beachfront Paradise in Vietnam
description: Discover the peacefully secluded Lang Co - a beachfront paradise home to pristine beaches, turquoise lagoons and tropical mountain ranges and surrounded by three UNESCO World Heritage sites. Experience seven or ten nights at the exclusive Angsana Lang Co - Banyan Tree’s sister property - and indulge in daily buffet breakfast, two three-course dinners, a three-course lunch, nightly sunset cocktails, two 60-minute massages to share, return airport shuttle services, Kids Club access for the little ones, a late 3pm checkout and more.
offer_address: Cu Du Village, Loc Vinh Commune, Phu Loc District, Thua Thien Hue Province, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Oceanfront Vietnam Retreat with Rooftop Bar & Private Beach
description:
Luxuriate for days at this five-star oceanfront retreat overlooking a private golden stretch of sand lining the South China Sea. Head to one of four onsite restaurants, digging into international dishes at Market Place or authentic Vietnamese seafood at Moomba. Upper Deck serves refreshing drinks on the rooftop overlooking the ocean and mountain range.

For a dose of relaxation, escape to the resort's tranquil spa or stretch out in the yoga pavilion. Or for an active escape, explore three UNESCO World Heritage sites nearby - Hoi An Ancient Town, The Imperial Citadel of Hue and My Son Sanctuary.
offer_address: Cu Du Village, Loc Vinh Commune, Phu Loc District, Thua Thien Hue Province, Vietnam
